org.vivoweb.ingest.util.repo
Class MapRecordHandler

java.lang.Object
  org.vivoweb.ingest.util.repo.RecordHandler
      org.vivoweb.ingest.util.repo.MapRecordHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Iterable<Record>
public class MapRecordHandler
extends RecordHandler

Record Handler that uses a Java Map to store records in memory

Author:
Christopher Haines (hainesc@ctrip.ufl.edu)
